argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_0z | |- 0 e. ZZ |
| 2 |  | #P_gcdcom | |- ( ( 0 e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( 0 gcd N ) = ( N gcd 0 ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpan | |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( 0 gcd N ) = ( N gcd 0 ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_gcd0id | |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( 0 gcd N ) = ( abs ` N ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( N gcd 0 ) = ( abs ` N ) ) |
